author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
While it’s unclear how state lawmakers even have the time or ability to come up with over 4,000 potential bills, you would at least expect the last thing they would have included would be proposed laws that would condone degeneracy and criminality. However, that is not the case, and the State of Illinois is trying to do just that.

Illinois lawmakers have proposed 4,000 bills for 2025-2026. Among these is HB3518, which would decriminalize prostitution if passed. Another bill,
title: Illinois Lawmakers Propose 1000s Of New Woke Bills, Some Of Which More Insane Than You Could Imagine

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It turns out that there is a legal and correct way to accept asylum refugees, as proven by how persecuted South Africans have landed in the United States and are already assimilating into the culture. Today’s show breaks down why the left hates white refugees.

According to NBC:

American officials welcomed a group of 59 white South Africans at Washington Dulles International Airport on Monday afternoon, in a ceremony greeting them as refugees under the argument that they are fleeing discrimination and racially based violence i
title: Watch: Why The Left Hates White Refugees Fleeing South Africa

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The reason you should not believe people like Bernie Sanders and AOC when it comes to climate disaster predictions is because they do not even feel believe their crap. Because if they did, they would do everything in their power to not fly around in private jets and create more carbon emissions than the average American in five years.

So, while Sanders has already admitted he has ZERO regrets for doing just that, he has proved to be more hypocritical than leftists could ever imagine.

EXPOSED: Bernie Sanders' "Fighting Oligarchy" tour spewed over 60 tonnes of CO₂ via private jets—more than an average American emits in 5 years!

Rules for thee but not for me.

Hypocri
title: Remember Bernie Sanders’ "Oligarchy Tour" on a private jet? He caused more "climate change" than it would take you to do in five years

author: Brodigan
description:
The United Kingdom is set on arresting people for memes, including retirees. We take a look at the British thought police so far. President Donald Trump has scheduled his first international trip as president (again), and he’ll be headed to the Middle East. Why the Middle East and why is it important? We’re here to tell you. Persecuted South Africans have landed in the United States. It’s almost like they sought asylum the correct way and are already assimilating to the American way of life.

UK THOUGHT POLICE STRIKE AGAIN
title: Trump Welcomes South Africans: Why The Left Hates White Refugees (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
Pay Attention, America. A former police officer was arrested in the UK over what was deemed an "antisemetic tweet." Except a) it wasn't, b) police ransacked his house looking for any other sign of extremism, and c) even if it was "antisemetic," authorities in the UK will ransack your house and arrested you OVER A TWEET THEY CLAIM TO BE OFFENSIVE.

Before we go further, refresh your memory with these JD Vance bars calling out Europe for its lack of free speech protections.

JD Vance went to the Munich Security Conference and roasted the entire continent of Europe for being petty tyrants and criminalizing freedom of speech, including a British man arrested for praying at an abortion clinic.
pic.twitter.com/o51VoWZ6Mr
— Greg
title: UK police ransack home of former officer over claims of an antisemitic tweet... except it wasn't, and now he's suing

author: Brodigan
description:
Democrats discovered in November that they have a problem appealing to young men. They have a problem appealing to anyone other than single cat ladies, but young men is where they risk losing them for generations. Their response? Give David Hogg a leadership position! Now after a few months of Hogg being a Democrat leader, the DNC is voting to take his job away because it should have gone to a diverse woman instead and the Democrat Party has rules for such things.

— (@)

Hogg, who thinks the problem with Am
title: David Hogg calls for Democrats to help young men get laid... so now the DNC is voting to fire him from his job
